review_text:
This car have expensive look but this car is only around 16 to 18 lacs outstanding comfort
All basics features and also have unique features such as climate control ,ABS ,auto headlights , rear adjustable seats and very comfortable car look are very aggressive and attractive.

reviewer_info: Posted by Mujtaba Haider on Apr 18, 2023
review_text: Perfect family car, Drive & Fuel consumption is far better then local build cars. Road grip & Comfort is exceptional. All parts are easily available, AC output is satisfactory. Build Quality is too good i.e plastic used inside the cabin etc. You will certainly fall in love after having the drive of this car.
